nodes.text: HC-100 was the droid companion and homework checker of Ken in the Lost City of the Jedi. HC-100 had a humanoid body with silver plating and blue photoreceptor eyes. HC-100 was built by DJ-88. He was made to resemble C-3PO, and he walked and talked like a drill sergeant. He would often appear at random times to check Ken's homework, whether it was done or not.
